comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Catherine Brimmer was a look-alike of Edith Galt ("Mrs. Norman Galt"), the fiancee and later wife of President Wilson. See the article "Pittsburgh Woman Taken For Fiancee of President" which describes that C. Brimmer was taken several times for the President's future wife while she was in Washington in The Washington times., October 14, 1915, HOME EDITION, Image 7, first column Edith Galt:
